attributes.additional_details: With Scotland and Wales already getting preferential treatment with regards to a number of issues; including education - their students get free degree education whilst ours typically pay £27000 to get a degree, it is time to give the English the same opportunity afforded the Scots - a referendum on the future of the UK and England's participation. I call on the Government to show that it is as committed to the English as it is to the Scots! Give us English a choice.

rejection.details:
Please see below petition:

Petition Title: England To Leave The UK Referendum

Created by: Jon Mitchell

Closing: 30/03/2015
